item.title: pubsub
item.description: Usage ocm set pubsub {<ocm repository>} [<pub/sub specification>] Options -d, --delete delete pub/sub configuration -h, --help help for pubsub Description A repository may be able to store a publish/subscribe specification to propagate the creation or update of component versions.
